text: 4:15 2 Korin 5:21; Hibru 2:17; 7:26; 1 Pita 2:22; 1 Jon 3:5E uari arazir kuraba dɨkabɨnamin gavgaviba puvatɨ. Egh e kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan kogham, Ofa Gamir Gumazibar Dapanir kam, en nɨghnɨzibagh fogh en kuarkuvighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Satanɨn ifavarir arazir e bativiziba, da uaghan bar a bativigha gɨfa. Ezɨ an arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ.
